Title: Emancipation
Plot: While Foreman takes on a pediatric case on his own, the rest of the team deals with a 16-year-old factory manager and emancipated minor who collapses at work. When Foreman's patient takes a turn for the worse, he's forced to question whether he can deal with the situation on his own, or if he needs House's help.
GuestStars: Alexandra Lydon, Bob McCracken, Emily Rios, Kyle Silverstein, Liza Colon-Zayas, Nathan Gamble
